analyticsDashboard.title: Analytics Center
analyticsDashboard.subtitle: Browse reports and analyze company data

financialReport.title: Financial Report
financialReport.description: Detailed chain analysis: PO → Batch → MO → CO → Invoice. Track cost flow and margins.

productionCosts.title: Production Costs
productionCosts.description: Product manufacturing cost analysis. Track material costs and full production costs.

cashflow.title: Cashflow
cashflow.description: Cash flow analysis. Monitor revenues, operational expenses and financial balance.

productionTime.title: Production Time
productionTime.description: Production time analysis with daily, weekly and monthly distribution charts. Monitor efficiency.

moConsumption.title: MO Consumption
moConsumption.description: Material consumption report in production tasks. Track costs and material batches.

productionProgress.title: Production Progress
productionProgress.description: Production task progress monitoring. Analyze trends and delays.

inventoryExpiry.title: Expiry Dates
inventoryExpiry.description: Overview of batches with short expiry dates. Prevent losses and plan utilization.

productionTimeline.title: Production Timeline
productionTimeline.description: Visualization of production task timeline. Plan and optimize resource load.

forecast.title: Demand Forecast
forecast.description: Material demand forecasting. Plan purchases and avoid shortages.

quickAccess.title: Quick access to reports
quickAccess.description: Select a report from the tiles above to access detailed data analysis. Each report offers interactive filters and data export capabilities.

sales.title: Sales Trend
sales.description: Sales value over time showing growth or declining trends in company revenue.
sales.label: Sales (PLN)

production.title: Production Trend
production.description: Number of production tasks completed and planned in consecutive months.

inventory.title: Inventory Value Trend
inventory.description: Change in total inventory value over time - helps monitor stock levels and plan purchases.
inventory.label: Inventory value (PLN)

errors.invalidLabels: Invalid chart data format - missing arrays
errors.mismatchedArrays: Mismatched length of labels and data arrays
